abstract: We are all having a love affair with Paris right alongside you. ♥️ Closures be damned.
I’m sad 20 in 20 is almost over! Let’s all just appreciate the hard work put into these videos 🥰

LOVE THIS VIDEO !! 
This area has been my neighborhood for several years now and boy you did it justice !! Great job of balancing the must-do tourist bits of Sacre Cœur area as well as more off the beaten path parts of the hill aka my favorite parts, as a resident. This video is pitch perfect.
Bummed I missed seeing you around on the wheelie yesterday!! 
And yes to more videos on the 18th!
